title: Silver 4 looking for duo partner to reach gold
body: Silver 4 JG/ ADC main looking to reach Gold, I can play consistently well, looking for another consistent player to duo with, as climbing solo is rough, I have my own TS server. Add Tyrantar.

replies.body: Yo, add me GORDONNODROG Im S5 atm, Top and Jungle main. Looking to climb as well. :)

I'm happy to help you out as I am climbing again (former S2, now B3 due to dynamic soloQ) back into Silver and hopefully get to Gold as well. I have all the chatting clients. I play nearly every evening till late.
